name: Word Travels - Word Scapes puzzle game
name_original: Word Travels - Word Scapes puzzle game
description:
🥇 The word game guaranteed to get you thinking, your mind stimulated and your memory challenged! 🥇

Travel the world with this new word puzzle game to entertain, educate and engage you time after time! With hundreds of levels varying in difficulty and an extensive range of words to tease your brain, your first-class ticket to challenging yourself starts here! ✈️

With a hot air balloon as your mode of travel, soar your way through the zones and feel the heat with over 1,500 puzzles which get more difficult as you play. And why not mix things up and switch between crossword modes? You can play with definitions prompting you to find the correct word, or attempt to join letters together to complete the grid.

This fresh take on the classic crossword puzzle will travel with you around the world and keep your brain engaged wherever you are!

• Perfect to play at home or abroad

• Mix it up between with Crossword mode and Word Search mode

• Powered by Oxford Dictionaries

• Discover and define thousands of new words

• Ask your friends and family with the share feature

• Play and learn new words on the go with the offline mode

• Unearth hidden words

• Become an expert at crosswords and word puzzles!

Please contact us at fun@funstudio.games with any questions or to report bugs.
